name: Simulation Pro Yakyuu '99
overview: Simulation Pro Yakyuu '99 allows the player to be the coach of a professional baseball team, the game features stats and data of the year 1999 season. In the game the player can buy or sell players between teams and edit teams in the editor, decide the team strategy, the tactics during the match, etc. The game allows the player to view the match or only the results.
